@graph.activity-id:name: CMIP

@graph.activity-id:description: The Large Ensemble Single Forcing Model Intercomparison Project
@graph.activity-id:name: LESFMIP

@graph.source-id:label: NorESM2-LM
@graph.source-id:label-extended: NorESM2-LM (low atmosphere-medium ocean resolution, GHG concentration driven)
@graph.source-id:name: NorESM2-LM

@graph.model-component:description: CICE-HadGEM3-GSI8 (eORCA1 tripolar primarily 1 deg; 360 x 330 longitude/latitude)
@graph.model-component:name: CICE-HadGEM3-GSI8

@graph.model-component:description: unnamed (thermodynamic (Semtner zero-layer) dynamic (Hibler 79) sea ice model)
@graph.model-component:name: unnamed

@graph.model-component:description: NEMO-HadGEM3-GO6.0 (eORCA1 tripolar primarily 1 deg with meridional refinement down to 1/3 degree in the tropics; 360 x 330 longitude/latitude; 75 levels; top grid cell 0-1 m)
@graph.model-component:name: NEMO-HadGEM3-GO6.0

@graph.model-component:description: CCSR AGCM (T85; 256 x 128 longitude/latitude; 81 levels; top level 0.004 hPa)
@graph.model-component:name: CCSR_AGCM

@graph.model-component:description: Varies with physics-version (p==1 Non-interactive, p>1 GPUCCINI)
@graph.model-component:name: Varies_with_physics-version

@graph.model-component:description: MICOM (1 degree resolution; 360 x 384; 70 levels; top grid cell minimum 0-2.5 m [native model uses hybrid density and generic upper-layer coordinate interpolated to z-level for contributed data])
@graph.model-component:name: MICOM

@graph.model-component:description: MPIOM1.63 (bipolar GR1.5, approximately 1.5deg; 256 x 220 longitude/latitude; 40 levels; top grid cell 0-12 m)
@graph.model-component:name: MPIOM1.63

@graph.model-component:description: CAM-OSLO (2 degree resolution; 144 x 96; 32 levels; top level 3 mb)
@graph.model-component:name: CAM-OSLO

@graph.model-component:description: ECHAM6.3 (spectral T63; 192 x 96 longitude/latitude; 47 levels; top level 0.01 hPa)
@graph.model-component:name: ECHAM6.3

@graph.model-component:description: MetUM-HadGEM3-GA7.1 (N96; 192 x 144 longitude/latitude; 85 levels; top level 85 km)
@graph.model-component:name: MetUM-HadGEM3-GA7.1

@graph.model-component:description: GISS-E2.1 (2.5x2 degree; 144 x 90 longitude/latitude; 40 levels; top level 0.1 hPa)
@graph.model-component:name: GISS-E2.1

@graph.model-component:description: GISS Ocean (GO1, 1 degree; 360 x 180 longitude/latitude; 40 levels; top grid cell 0-10 m)
@graph.model-component:name: GISS_Ocean
